titleStmt.title: The royal martyr, and the dutiful subject in two sermons / by G. Burnet.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715. Royal martyr lamented.
Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715. Subjection for conscience-sake asserted.

notesStmt.note: Each sermon also has special t.p. and separate paging.
The second sermon, "Subjection for conscience-sake asserted" also issued separately as Wing B5928, and found at reel 760:9. "The royal martyr lamented" filmed separately as Wing B5869A on reel 2345.
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library.
